title: Slice of Cake
summaries: The Slice of Cake is a furniture item acquired by being the first player to talk to the Party Girl during a Party that occurred by random chance at dawn (player-initiated Parties will not cause her to give players the Slice of Cake).

Placing and pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on the Slice of Cake grants the Sugar Rush buff, which grants +20% movement speed and +20% mining speed. This lasts for 2 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).

Unlike <linked>equipment buff items</linked>, the Slice of Cake must be placed in order to activate the buff. It can be mined with a <linked>pickaxe</linked> or <linked>drill</linked> and picked up again, even while the buff is active, which will not cancel the buff. Placement is only dependent on an adequate space of 2×2 tiles being available.
